name: Neon Night Lights 2000
description:
Welcome to Neon City!!  Unfortunately the power is out and energon has been dispersed throughout the streets.   Collect the energy and return it to the conduits to restore power each city block before time runs out!

Controls:

  • Click PLAY to start 
  • WASD / Arrows 
  • Move ESC 
  • Quit Enter to advance level (lvl complete) or return to title (game over)

This game was made for the Admix Spring Jam https://itch.io/jam/admix-spring-game-jam and then I added some features that never made it to the final version.

It was also developed in 2 days with the awesome developer from https://ohimagames.itch.io
